Record.ClassificationPath: Parasitic Diseases/Skin Diseases, Parasitic/Ectoparasitic Infestations/Lice Infestations
Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Diseases, Infectious/Skin Diseases, Parasitic/Lice Infestations
Record.Description: Parasitic attack or subsistence on the skin by members of the order Phthiraptera, especially on humans by Pediculus humanus of the family Pediculidae. The hair of the head, eyelashes, and pubis is a frequent site of infestation. (From Dorland, 28th ed; Stedman, 26th ed)
